biography.bio: Tall (5'9"), leggy and slender brunette stunner Kimberly Kane was born on August 28, 1983, in Tacoma, Washington. Her mother was an exotic dancer and porn movie producer, and Kimberly--who has a sister, stepbrother and half-brother--grew up around the adult film industry. Her first job was working as a hostess at a Mexican restaurant, and her later jobs included a home care provider, selling cars on a used-car lot and, for one year, a dancer. She moved to Los Angeles to pursue a career in adult films, and performed in her first porn in August of 2003. In 2004 she was named Hottest Newcomer by Babeland.com. She branched out into directing in 2006, for Vivid Entertainment. She has received AVN Awards for Best Group Sex Scene and Best Oral Sex Scene in 2006, an AVN Award for Best All-Girl 3-Way Sex Scene in 2009, an AVN Award for Best Actress, an XBIZ Award for Acting Performance of the Year-Female, an XRCO Award for Single Performance-Actress in 2010, an AVN Award for Best Three-Way Sex Scene and an XRCO Award for Best Actress in 2011. She was also named one of the top 12 female stars of porn by Maxim magazine in 2010. She appeared in a Public Service Announcement for the Free Speech Coalition on the topic of Internet piracy of adult content that same year. An avid gamer, Kimberly participates in a weekly "Dungeons and Dragons" game with fellow adult-film performers and sex industry workers.
biography.name: Kimberly Kane

biography.bio: Comely, sexy, and slender 5'7" blonde bombshell Lexi Swallow was born on June 27, 1986 in San Diego, California. Lexi went to college and worked in sales prior to embarking on a career in porn. After initially getting her feet wet doing sex scenes for several adult websites, Swallow first began performing in explicit hardcore movies at age 23 in April, 2010. Among the notable companies Lexi has appeared in X-rated features for are Vivid, Evil Angel, Bang Productions, Pure Play Media, and Zero Tolerance. She has a pierced navel. Moreover, Swallow has also worked for various adult websites that include Twistys and Naughty America.
biography.name: Lexi Swallow

biography.bio: Cute and lissome honey blonde Chastity Lynn was born on August 10, 1987 in Seattle, Washington. Chastity initially attended a Catholic all-girls school, but eventually left and switched to public schools. Lynn began her career in the adult entertainment industry after making the acquaintance of porn starlet Ellie Idol at a party. Chastity started out by performing at age 21 in 2008 in hardcore X-rated features for such companies as Pure Play Media and Red Light District. Moreover, Lynn first did only girl-girl scenes with Idol, but has since branched out and done boy-girl scenes as well. She has a pierced navel and a tattoo of a lotus on her lower hip. In addition, Chastity owns a kitten named Lucy and runs her own official website.
biography.name: Chastity Lynn

biography.bio: Slender 5'5" African-American beauty Misty Stone was born Michelle Lynn Hall on March 26, 1986 in Inglewood, California. Stone grew up as a child in Omaha, Nebraska. Misty eventually moved to Los Angeles, California, where she attended Crenshaw High School in her junior and senior years and was a member of the high school varsity basketball team the Crenshaw Cougars. She started out in the adult entertainment industry dancing at strip clubs. Stone first began performing in explicit hardcore movies in 2006; she has appeared in X-rated features for such top companies as Hustler, Penthouse, Metro, Mile High, and Evil Angel. Moreover, Misty has been nominated for various awards that include a XRCO Award for Unsung Siren in 2010, an AVN Award for Female Performer of the Year in 2010, and AVN Awards for Best Actress in both 2011 and 2012.
biography.name: Misty Stone

biography.bio: The consistently entertaining Anthony Rosano has made an indelible impression in the world of adult filming. Anthony, whose alternate names include Mike McKay, Doughy Gecko and Anthony Russo, was born on January 31, 1977. A native of Hialeah, Florida, he first set foot upon the erotic entertainment scene in 2003 at 26 years old. Since then he has worked for numerous companies, most notably Elegant Angel, New Sensations and Digital Sin. He virtually transmutes between being a toned hunk on camera to being an FBI agent in the porn-styled parodies The Sex Files: A Dark XXX Parody (2009)_ and the prompt follow-up sequel The Sex Files 2: A Dark XXX Parody (2010), both films produced by Digital, in which he played the role parodying Agent Mulder and co-star Kimberly Kane, likewise parodying the role of Agent Scully.
biography.name: Anthony Rosano
